title: Engineering Transparency & Delivery Platform
description: Unified Jira and Azure DevOps taxonomies to improve traceability from portfolio themes to work items. Delivered KPI dashboards that guided investment decisions and improved delivery transparency.

title: CRM & Revenue Lifecycle Modernization
description: Consolidated Salesforce, Dynamics, and ServiceNow post-M&A into a unified CRM and sales platform. Standardized end-to-end Lead → Opportunity → Quote workflows, added deal guardrails, and surfaced pipeline insights with dashboards.

title: Segra360 – Unified Customer Portal
description: Launched customer portal consolidating billing, orders, service status, and usage data. Secured with OAuth2/OIDC/MFA and integrated analytics to improve engagement efficiency.

title: SegraMaps – Data Visualization Platform
description: Built geospatial visualization platform enabling faster network qualification, pricing, and targeting decisions. Delivered interactive maps and integrated workflows to improve sales efficiency.

title: Cloud & Platform Migrations
description: Led migrations of Dynamics 365 CRM and customer portals to Azure and ServiceNow, modernizing infrastructure, refactoring legacy code, and enabling Power Apps adoption.

title: Workflow & Contract Automation
description: Delivered workflow engines with economic guardrails, automated contract creation, and integrated e-signature to reduce cycle time and improve compliance.

title: Location Validation & Data Quality Services
description: Built data services integrating Dynamics, ESRI, and MuleSoft to validate addresses, prevent duplication, and enable accurate network site modeling.

title: Business Proposal Platform
description: Created branded, automated proposal generation application that reduced manual coordination and accelerated sales cycles.

title: Interactive Resume / Portfolio Site
description: Built React/Vite portfolio site with SEO metadata, dark mode, filtered views, and print-optimized layout. Deployed on GitHub Pages with automated CI/CD.

title: Portfolio Builder SaaS Prototype
impact: Lowered barriers to building shareable portfolios
description: Developed SaaS prototype with monetization, webhook persistence, and automated testing. Enabled rapid creation of recruiter-friendly portfolios with Stripe integration and reliability built into CI/CD pipelines.

title: Automated Testing
impact: Automated regression validation to catch regressions during feature rollouts
description: Implemented an automated Selenium-based end-to-end test suite to validate application features. Tests were provisioned and executed in Azure DevOps pipelines as part of the regression suite to validate new feature releases and prevent regressions.
